name: Bond
description: A PostCSS front-end component library and framework.

scripts.modernizr: cd node_modules/modernizr/ && npm install && node ./bin/modernizr -c ../../modernizr-config.json && cd ../../ && cp node_modules/modernizr/modernizr.js vendor/
scripts.slick: cp node_modules/slick-carousel/slick/slick.css vendor/ && cp node_modules/slick-carousel/slick/slick.js vendor/ && cp node_modules/slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css vendor/
scripts.datepicker: cp node_modules/pikaday/pikaday.js vendor/ && cp node_modules/pikaday/css/pikaday.css vendor/
scripts.bond: yarn install && rm -rf vendor && mkdir vendor && npm run jquery && npm run matchMedia && npm run modernizr && npm run normalize && npm run slick && npm run datepicker && npm run select2 && npm run lazyload
scripts.post: postcss post/*.css -c postcss.config.js -d css && node notify.js
